description: A luxury rare spice merchant landing page for the fictional brand SAFFRANIA. Warm saffron-gold palette on deep brown background, Hero Type G scroll-driven word split (SPICE/HOUSE), gold particle settle animation, twelve spices grid, harvest journal Swiper, atelier blending parallax section, and caravan dispatch newsletter.
heroDescription: Scroll-driven text transform: SPICE/HOUSE word pair splits apart horizontally on scroll. 200vh hero with sticky viewport. Upward-drifting gold particle system.
